listitem.para: Allow competing IKE_AUTH requests when both peers simultaneously initiate IKEv2 negotiations on the same connection. By default, when libreswan receives IKE_AUTH request from the peer while having an outstanding IKE_AUTH request, it responds with TEMPORARY_FAILURE to avoid potential SA mismatch issues. This option only applies to permanent IKEv2 connections so that the revival mechanism ensure connection retry.
The accepted values are no (the default) or yes.
